idea-plugin.name: Plugin for Adaptive Android Imposition
idea-plugin.description: This plugin can help you create Android items such as RecyclerView, TextView, BottomNavigation, BottomSheet, Buttons, Cards, Divider, FloatingActionButton, Toolbar with only few steps. You need to write some specific parameters and you receive qualitative code for your XML files. Also you can initialize your XML code in Java Activity classes or create new one as ViewHolder and Adapter class for RecyclerView.
